name: cloudflare
description: Complete Cloudflare platform ecosystem: Workers, D1 database, R2 storage, KV, Queues, Durable Objects, Workers AI, Vectorize, Workflows, Agents, Turnstile, Hyperdrive, Images, Browser Rendering, Zero Trust, and full-stack integrations. Use for building serverless applications, edge computing, distributed systems, AI at the edge, and Cloudflare deployments.
